snippet.title: Tower of BOOM v1.3 2D Run and Gun rogue-lite
snippet.description:
v1.3 of Tower of BOOM. A run and gun rogue-lite where you are a lone marine fighting against invading aliens in an endless building.

The game will continue to be updated and will be getting more characters, weapons, enemy types and even building layouts. The game will also undergo a makeover in later dev logs.

You can download the game for windows here :  https://vcp.itch.io/tower-of-boom
